PHRASE.LANG: "I can make people love me. Or fear me." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Je peux susciter l'amour, mais aussi la crainte." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Ich kann dafür sorgen, dass die Menschen mich lieben. Oder fürchten." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Posso fare in modo che la gente mi ami. O che mi tema." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Puedo hacer que la gente me ame. O me tema." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
